image

Class Processing

  • java.lang.Object
    • image.Processing

  • public class Processing
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is meant to do all the filtering of the image
    Author:
    Ylva

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static boolean delay
      This determines if there will be a delay or not (this delay can help visualize what is happening) Also this delay just looks freaking awesome :)

      • histogramEqualisation

        private static java.awt.image.BufferedImage histogramEqualisation(java.awt.image.BufferedImage buffer)
        This method will do all the histogram equalization
        Parameters:
        buffer - the image to process
        Returns:
        the image after histogram equalization is applied

      • blobDetection

        private static java.awt.image.BufferedImage blobDetection(java.awt.image.BufferedImage buffer)
        This method will detect and render blobs. The largest blobs are colored in the following order: red, green, yellow, magenta, cyan and orange
        Parameters:
        buffer - the image to process
        Returns:
        the image after blobdetection has been applied, this image will have the 6 largest blobs marked in different colors

      • findLowestBlobRecursive

        private static int[][] findLowestBlobRecursive(int[][] connectedBlobs,
                              int amountOfBlobs)
        Will make sure that the value for any blob in the connectedBlobs Array[][0] is the absolute lowest value that that blob is connected to
        Parameters:
        connectedBlobs - the array to process
        amountOfBlobs - the total amount of blobs
        Returns:
        the updated connectedBlobs array

      • calculateTempArray

        private static int[] calculateTempArray(int[] currentBlobArray,
                       int j,
                       int[][] connectedBlobs)
        Will update currentBlobArray with any values that it finds in connectedBlobs[j] that are not yet in currentBlobArray
        Parameters:
        currentBlobArray - the array that holds all the blob numbers that are part of the current blob
        j - the number in connectedBlobs from which all the connectedBlobs need to be checked
        connectedBlobs - the array that holds all the values for connectedBlobs
        Returns:
        the updated currentBlobArray

      • processTempArray

        private static int[][] processTempArray(int[][] connectedBlobs,
                       int[] currentBlobArray,
                       int i)
        Processes the given array with the given int Will make sure that all the blobs that are in currentBlobArray have i as their value in the connectedBlobsarray
        Parameters:
        connectedBlobs - the array to process in
        currentBlobArray - the array to process
        i - the number to process
        Returns:
        the updated connectedBlobsArray

      • calculateConnectedMass

        private static int[] calculateConnectedMass(int[][] connectedBlobs,
                           int[] mass)
        Will calculate the masses of all the connected blobs, setting the mass of the lowest blob number (base blob) to the total mass of all the connected blobs combined This will also set the mass of the all the blobs connected to this blob to be 0, i.e. only the base blob will have the mass in it.
        Parameters:
        connectedBlobs - the array with all the connections between blobs in it
        mass - the mass array with all the masses of the individual blobs in it
        Returns:
        the updated mass array

      • findLargestBlobs

        private static int[] findLargestBlobs(int[] mass,
                     int amountOfBlobs)
        will calculated an array of length 6 which the 6 largest blobs in them
        Parameters:
        mass - the mass array that holds the masses of all the blobs, should already have been updated in calculateConnectedMass method
        Returns:
        an array with the 6th largest blobs where the [0] it the largest

      • checkPos

        private static boolean checkPos(int x,
               int y,
               java.awt.image.BufferedImage buffer)
        This will check if a certain place is white
        Parameters:
        x - the X coordinate to check
        y - the Y coordinate to check
        Returns:
        true if the value of the coordinates to be checked is 255

      • updateConnectedBlobs

        private static int[][] updateConnectedBlobs(int one,
                           int two,
                           int[][] connected,
                           int nextCount)
        Will make sure that in the connected array there is a link between the 2 blobs
        Parameters:
        one - the first variable to update
        two - the second variable to update
        connected - the array with all the connected values
        Returns:
        the updated array

      • checkConnected

        private static boolean checkConnected(int one,
                     int two,
                     int[][] connected)
        This method will check if the 2 blobnumbers are already connected.
        Parameters:
        one - the first variable to check for
        two - the second variable to check for
        connected - the connected array
        Returns:
        true if the blobs are connected, false otherwise

      • findMinMaxOfBlob

        private static int[] findMinMaxOfBlob(java.awt.image.BufferedImage buffer,
                     java.awt.Color color)
        Will find the minimum and maximum coordinates of the blob that has the color specified
        Parameters:
        buffer - the image to check in
        color - the color for which to return the minimum coordinates
        Returns:
        an integer array with the following things in it: xMin, yMin, xMax, yMax

      • findNumberPlate

        public static void findNumberPlate(java.awt.image.BufferedImage original)
                            throws main.PlateNotFoundException
        This method only works for non threaded programs Method designed to find the numberplate This method will do the steps from histogram equalization, through color filter and onto blobdetection and then use those results to return an image with only the numberplate in it
        Parameters:
        original - the image to process
        Throws:
        main.PlateNotFoundException - this exception wil be thrown when the numberplate is not found and alternative measures are needed to continue

      • copyImage

        private static java.awt.image.BufferedImage copyImage(java.awt.image.BufferedImage source)
        This method is in order to get a second bufferedImage, this because just making a new bufferedImage and doing new = old then the new one will actually just point to the old one instead of making a complete new object. This method will first make a new BuferredImage type with the same settings as the old image and will then paint the old image on it (bassically)
        Parameters:
        source - the image to copy
        Returns:
        a new bufferedImage which is the same as the source

      • cutimage

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage cutimage(java.awt.image.BufferedImage source,
                                    int x,
                                    int y,
                                    int width,
                                    int height)
        Cuts an image out of the original image and returns that
        Parameters:
        source - the original image from which to cut (segment)
        x - the X coordinate to start
        y - the Y coordinate to start
        width - the width of the image to cut from the original
        height - the height of the image to cut from the original
        Returns:
        a new image which has bee cut from the old image

        private static javax.swing.ImageIcon ScaledImageIcon(java.awt.image.BufferedImage source)
